headline: AI chips will likely find their way to China despite export controls
summary: President Trump is expected to ease restrictions and artificial intelligence (AI) chip exports to Saudi Arabia while meeting with Saudi Prince Mohammed bin Salman on his trip to the Middle East. This has raised concerns that the technology could be resold to China. Brian McCarthy, Macrolens managing principal and chief strategist, explains the difficulties in containing the trade flows of semiconductors. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
